name: REDBLUE (NoahlSeymour)
description:
This game is best played with each player wearing a pair of modified stereoscopic 3d glasses. Each pair should be modified so that they only have red or blue cellophane. It can also theoretically work with each player looking through any kind of cellophane as long as each player has a different colour. 

When starting the game the colours need to be adjusted so that each player can only see their portion of the game. 

Begin by pressing P on the keyboard. This will bring up this menu:

Each player should adjust the colours till they appear like this:

Once each player has set their colours correctly, pressing P again will close the menu.

Each player should be controlling the player marked by an X when the colours are adjusted correctly. 

The Game Requires 2 controllers to play

The goal is to get to the large circle.
